name: addRoleToVariable
shortDescription: Adds a role to a variable
description: This method adds a role to a variable.
signatures: Boolean addRoleToVariable(Integer peerId, Integer channel, String variableName, Integer roleId)

parameters.name: peerId
parameters.description: The ID of the peer to add the role to.

parameters.name: channel
parameters.description: The channel of the peer to add the role to.

parameters.name: variableName
parameters.description: The variable of the peer to add the role to.

parameters.name: roleId
parameters.description: The ID of the role as returned by createRole() or getRoles().

returnValue: Returns true on success and false if something went wrong (e. g. unknown channel).
